title: Vegetables cooked in turmeric and rice vinegar
description: This soupy, Asian-style vegetable dish is great either as a side or a light main course - try it with baked spiced fish.
ingredients: 2 lemongrass stalks, bruised slightly (crush a little with a rolling pin)
3cm/1¼in piece fresh root ginger, slightly crushed
250g/9oz green beans, washed, trimmed, cut 5mm/¼in lengths
1 cucumber, cut in half lengthways, seeds scraped out, flesh chopped into 7mm/¼in cubes
